xml.data:
Home » 16A5 Pañcakanipātapāḷi » 3 Tatiyapaṇṇāsaka » 3.1 Phāsuvihāravagga
3.1.10 Araññasutta
Tatiyapaṇṇāsaka
Phāsuvihāravagga
Araññasutta
110.
658“Pañcahi, bhikkhave, dhammehi samannāgato bhikkhu alaṃ araññavanapatthāni pantāni senāsanāni paṭisevituṃ. Katamehi pañcahi? Idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu sīlavā hoti…pe…  samādāya sikkhati sikkhāpadesu; bahussuto hoti…pe…  diṭṭhiyā suppaṭividdhā; āraddhavīriyo viharati thāmavā daḷhaparakkamo anikkhittadhuro kusalesu dhammesu; catunnaṃ jhānānaṃ ābhicetasikānaṃ diṭṭhadhammasukhavihārānaṃ nikāmalābhī hoti akicchalābhī akasiralābhī; āsavānaṃ khayā anāsavaṃ cetovimuttiṃ paññāvimuttiṃ diṭṭheva dhamme sayaṃ abhiññā sacchikatvā upasampajja viharati. Imehi kho, bhikkhave, pañcahi dhammehi samannāgato bhikkhu alaṃ araññavanapatthāni pantāni senāsanāni paṭisevitun”ti.
659Dasamaṃ.
660Phāsuvihāravaggo paṭhamo.
661Tassuddānaṃ
662
Sārajjaṃ saṅkito coro,
Sukhumālaṃ phāsu pañcamaṃ;
Ānanda sīlāsekhā ca,
Cātuddiso araññena cāti.
<< 3.1.9 Cātuddisasuttaup3.2 Andhakavindavagga >>
